T10n2902u_001:13: [ sa ca ] vasanair [ api ] hīno babhūva |
T10n2902u_001:16: divābhāge sa vṛṣabhaṃ karmaṇi niyojya paścāt tamādāya ca
T10n2902u_001:28: babhūva | sa gṛhapatirapi bhuktvā tad bhojyamuttasthau |
T10n2902u_001:29: tatra [ gṛhacatvare ] ca vṛṣaṃ nāvalokya tena [ gṛhapatinā ] “ vṛṣabhaḥ kkāstī “ ti daṇḍī papracche |
T10n2902u_001:36: tena [ daṇḍinā ] [ praty- ] uktam - “ tava gṛhe muktaḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:37: [ gṛhapatiḥ punar ] uvāca - “ tvayā me puṃgavo yatastyaktaḥ [ atastaṃ tvaṃ me ] pratyarpaye “ ti |
T10n2902u_001:41: tena [ daṇḍinā ] uttaritam - “ na mayā [ vṛṣo ] nāśitaḥ “ iti |
T10n2902u_001:46: [ sa rājā ] āvayornyāyyatvam anyāyyatvaṃ ca vicārayiṣyatī “ tyuktvā jāmatuśca |
T10n2902u_001:50: [ tadā ] kasyacij janāntarasya kāścidaśvā [ chinnabandhanā sartā ] palāyitavatī |
T10n2902u_001:51: tena [ janāntareṇa ] daṇḍī [“ kka mamāśve “ ti ] pṛṣṭaḥ |
T10n2902u_001:58: [ daṇḍī pratya- ] uvāca - “ na [ mayā vṛṣavat ] turṅgamā [ 'pi bandhanān ] nocite “ ti |
T10n2902u_001:62: [ tatas ] tena [ daṇḍinā aśvāgatirodhārtha ] upalaḥ kaścij jagṛhe aśvāṃ [ prati ] nicikṣipe ca [; ]
T10n2902u_001:63: [ sa copalaḥ ] aśvāyāḥ padamekamāhatya [ tad ] babhañja |
T10n2902u_001:67: tena [ janena ] jagade - “ yatastvayā turagā mama māritā'taḥ pratidehi [ me ] mamā'śvām “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:86: [ apasaraṇāvasare ] sa ca kasyacit kuḍayasyādhastād avapupluve |
T10n2902u_001:90: [ tatas ] tantuvāyasya bhāryayā sa daṇḍī [ kare ] dadhre |
T10n2902u_001:94: [ sā ] uvāca - “ yatastvayā mama bhartā nihataḥ [ ataḥ ] pratiyaccha me bhartāram “ iti |
T10n2902u_001:98: [ daṇḍī praty- ] uvāca - “ kathaṃ te svāmī mayā pratidāyiṣyate ?“ iti |
T10n2902u_001:108: [ teṣāṃ gamana- ] mārgasya madhye kācid gambhīrā nadī babhūva |
T10n2902u_001:109: salilasya tasya sammukha [ taṭe ] sūtradharaḥ kaścin mukhena kuṭhāramudrahannāgataḥ
T10n2902u_001:110: | papracche sa ca daṇḍinā - “ kiyaj jalasya gāmbhīryam “ iti |
T10n2902u_001:114: “ gabhīratā'sti nīrasye “ ti kathanena [ sūtradharasya ] kuṭhāro jale papāta |
T10n2902u_001:120: [ sūtradhareṇādhiṃkṣipto - ] “ tvayā me paraśvadhaḥ payasi pātitaḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:127: tena [ daṇḍinā praty - ] ūce - “ na [ mayā'yam ] astaḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:138: [ tatas ] te [ sarve ] gatvā ca narapateḥ sannidhiṃ prāpuḥ |
T10n2902u_001:145: tataśca bhūpatiṃnā te papracchire - “ kiṃmarthaṃ yūyamāgatāḥ “ iti |
T10n2902u_001:153: [ tad vivaraṇamākarṇya ] bhūpena daṇḍī babhāṣe - “ kiṃ tvayā vṛṣo dhārita ?“ itiṃ |
T10n2902u_001:162: [ tathā ] pratidehi yathā gṛhapatinā [ puṃgavaḥ pratyarṇaṇakāle ] dṛśyate “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:166: [ daṇḍayuvāca - ] “ sasambodhanaṃ hi na [ vṛṣo gṛhapataye prati - ] dattaḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:173: paśyannapiṃ na babandha [ ato'sya ] nayanam [ ekam ] utpāṭaye “ ti |
T10n2902u_001:177: gṛhapatiṃnoce - “ prathamato mama vṛṣo daṇḍinā nāśitaḥ |
T10n2902u_001:178: dvitīyato mama nayanāpanayanaṃ yato varamato [ vivāde ] daṇḍyeva jayī bhavatu “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:182: janena kenacit [ turaṅgamākhāminā ] ūce - “ deva daṇḍinā mamāśvā mārite “ ti |
T10n2902u_001:186: nṛpeṇa daṇḍī papracche - “ kathaṃ tvayāśvā nihate “ ti |
T10n2902u_001:190: [ daṇḍī cacakṣe - ] “ yadāhaṃ pathā gantumārabdhavāṃstadā [ turaṅgamā ] sanāgatā |
T10n2902u_001:191: janenā'nenā'śvā [ bandhanān ] na mociteti [ sā svayamucchinnabandhanā ] tadā prāptā |
T10n2902u_001:193: [ grāvāṇaṃ taṃ ] niratyāśvā [ sā mayā ] nihatā “ iti |
T10n2902u_001:197: narapatinoce - “ aśvapatinā'śvā [ bandhanān ] na mociteti hetorasya rasanāṃ chindhi |
T10n2902u_001:199: nicikṣipa iti bāhum [ asyaikaṃ ] kṛndhi “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:206: janena tena [ saptipatinā ] proktam - “ prathamato mama ghoṭakī hatā |
T10n2902u_001:208: jiṃhvā me chetsyate varamato daṇḍayeva jayī bhavatu “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:212: [ tatas ] tantuvāyasya bhāryayā babhāṣe - “ bhartā me daṇḍinā hataḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:216: daṇḍinā [ nṛpāya ] niveditam - “ vardhitā mama śatrava iti bhītaḥ [ sannahaṃ ] prācīrādavaplutya palāyitavān |
T10n2902u_001:217: [ tena ca ] antarāle āsīno'dṛṣṭo janaḥ [ kuvindo ] nihataḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:227: tayā [ tantuvāyajāyayā ] jagade - “ prathamato me khāmī mṛtaḥ |
T10n2902u_001:228: dvitīyato yato'yaṃ [ vaidheyo ] dhavo [ mama ] bhaviṣyati varamato daṇḍayeva jayī bhavatu [ nirṇaye “ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:232: [ tataḥ ] sūtradhareṇodīritam - “ yato'yaṃ daṇḍī māṃ pṛṣṭavān ' kiyaj jalasya gāmbhīryami ' ti [ ato mama ] mukhād vidhṛtaḥ kuṭhāro nīre patitaḥ “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:236: bhūpena maṇitam - “ yat kiñcidapi hārya vastu skandhe vahanasya
T10n2902u_001:237: yogyamiti hetor [ anena ] yata ānane [ paraśur ] ūḍhaḥ [ ataḥ ] pūrvam [ asya ] sūtradharasya dantadvayaṃ bhaṅgdhi |
T10n2902u_001:238: ' kim [ asty ] ambhaso gāmbhīryami ' ti yataḥ [ papracche ] daṇḍī [ ato'sya ] jihvāṃ chindhi “ [ iti ] |
T10n2902u_001:242: [ tadā ] sūtradhareṇokm - “ prathamato mama paraśurnaṣṭaḥ [ evaṃ ] te sarve [ svasvocitāṃ ] pṛthag vicāraniṣpattiṃ cākriṃre |
